## NoGridInitializerComponent class

Component used for rendering no grid initializer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NoGridInitializerComponent implements NoGridInitializer, GridPluginGeneric<NoGridInitializerOptions> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [gridPlugins](./grid.nogridinitializercomponent.gridplugins.md) |  | <code>GridPluginInstances</code> | Grid plugin instances available for this plugin |
|  [options](./grid.nogridinitializercomponent.options.md) |  | <code>NoGridInitializerOptions</code> | Options for grid plugin |
|  [pluginElement](./grid.nogridinitializercomponent.pluginelement.md) |  | <code>ElementRef</code> | Element that represents plugin |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getItemsPerPage()](./grid.nogridinitializercomponent.getitemsperpage.md) |  | Gets stored items per page |
|  [getOrdering()](./grid.nogridinitializercomponent.getordering.md) |  | Gets stored ordering |
|  [getPage()](./grid.nogridinitializercomponent.getpage.md) |  | Gets stored page |
|  [initialize()](./grid.nogridinitializercomponent.initialize.md) |  | Initialize plugin, to be ready to use, initialize communication with other plugins |
